title: Why i can't get my garen skin from twiter?
body: Why i can't get my {{champion:86}}  skin from twiter? can i get help? I rlly like this {{champion:86}}  skin.

replies.body:
Sometimes the redemption process bugs out. If you send a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in, Blitzcrank bot or one of our account specialists should help out with this. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
